headline: A Look at Allstate’s (ALL) Valuation Following Its Three-Year Total Shareholder Return Surge
summary: Why Allstate Stock Is Back on Investors Radar Allstate (ALL) has quietly outperformed many peers over the past 3 years, more than doubling investors money, even as net income growth has cooled and recent returns look more muted. See our latest analysis for Allstate. Over the past year, Allstate’s total shareholder return of 8.55 percent signals steady if unspectacular momentum. The modest recent share price pullback toward 203.82 dollars suggests investors are reassessing risks after a...
